<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
PLUME: Look at these marvels.. Friends, we have discovered a new species of lifeforms native to this star system!
2
1
COLEUS: I have never seen anything quite like them! They look mesmerizing, bobbing up and down as their bioluminescence dances on the surface of the water..
3
2
MELORAE: How exciting.. I cannot imagine what new species of life we may discover as we explore the rest of this star system!
Pioneer EX3 1
